name: Unethicards
description:
Submission for Murcia Jam 2021, with the theme "Unethical decisions"
https://itch.io/jam/mjam21

All cards in Unethicards represent dubious methods to accomplish victory. You'll be able to use and combo unethical cards to reduce your opponent's HP to 0 and win the game.

The game was created for a 16:9 aspect ratio screen!

Controls: Mouse and left click.

Everything is created by us except sound and music.

Álvaro Plaza Such - 3D modeling.

https://twitter.com/Alvaro_30300

Francisco José Ponce Martínez - Game design.
https://twitter.com/Kico1603

Jorge Pons Asensio - Concept art and 2D sprites.
https://twitter.com/TCLDrawings

Juan Manuel Martínez Thor - 3D modeling.

Valerio Marty Rodríguez - Programming and Tech art.
https://twitter.com/ValerioMarty
